title: "Here Come the Killer Robots"
excerpt: "While we’ve had versions of autonomous weapons systems for decades, the latest advances in AI have made today’s killer robots more sophisticated. Popular autonomous weapons systems include drones that can fly themselves, autonomous drone swarms, and AI targeting systems that automatically choose their targets."
